entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 90 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 30 km/h in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
